page.title: 18LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Can money be raised to save{St. John's {Church,}now 713 years old, from decay or demolition? Could it be converted into a{"Heritage Centre",}a meeting place for local historians? By Sept. 1986 Belper area will no longer be operating a{First,Middle and {High school}system of education.Seven Primary schools and one secondary school working as a split site will exist.Resulting from the reorganisation{Hazelwood Church {controlled school}opened in 1845/46 will close,as will{Fleet first school. In the{Belper to Milford Mill Charity {Raft Race}72 rafts took part.This is the second year that it has been organised and is likely to cintinue as a regular event.
